detailsOfAchievement: SHG of Kusim Rongmitel is to educate, organize and empower the poor, dalits women and children who would in future act as a catalyst in promoting gender equality, justice, economic growth and self-reliance. we have be projected programmes like local need best which in terms do the physical work in developing their own SHG semi pucca building. It is the way to develop their own activities and learnt the way of working by means of physical work. Practically in mordern period of time youth are well

sourceOfFunds.purpose: In view of the present scenario, the SHG of Kusim Rongmitel planned and organize the awareness on global . All the nearest youth clubs and village key leaders were invited to attend on this awareness programme. It is learnt and discuss the changing of this earth in the context of heat, less degree of rainfall, disappearing wild animals and birds, dying and drying of streams, less fruit-bearing, green hills deformed to desert. In this awareness programme was to make understand the global warming.

In view of the present scenario, the SHG of Kusim Rongmitel planned and organize the awareness on Human Trafficking at Kusimkolgre. All the nearest youth members, village key leaders and school student were invited to attend on this awareness programme. In this awareness programme all the attendants were active and request to organise such awareness programme in future for the benefit of the area specially for the youth and culture as a whole. We thank the department for assisting such programme

In collaboration with Nehru Yuva Kendra, Williamnagar, the SHG of Kusim Rongmitel has organized the work camp for three days at Kusimkolgre East Garo Hills, Williamnagar. To initiate this programme Mr. Sengkhan Marak President of SHG of Kusim Rongmitel briefly explain the role of function and participate till the end of the programme. On these three days programme youth members prepare new bamboos wall around the SHG Office premises. It is the part of every youth to show their unity strength

In view of the present senario, the pendemic spread of Covid 19 the SHG of Kusim Rongmitel hold an emergency meeting at the premises by maintaining the government protocol. Disscussion were made and plan to help for the needy youth specially form our village who are coming from diffrent states of India. Members contribute Rs. 1000 each for the expences to arrange food and fruits for them. SHG President monitor the situation in helping to distributing the fruits and packet food who are in troubl

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Out of School Children is a scheme of Sarvo Shiksha Abhiyan implemented by the State Governments through NGOs for providing special training to Out of School Children IN EAST Khasi Hills District .

Out of School Children is the scheme of the Government of India under SSA being implemented by the State Government through the concerned NGOs. SPARK has one such Centre in Rangmen Village in Ri-Bhoi District where Education is provided to Out of School Children and thereafter, mainstreaming them in the nearest schools.

Through this support, Mid Day Meal is served to the Out of School Children enrolled at OoSC Centre at Rangmen Village under Umsning Block, Ri Bhoi District of Meghalaya. Records and photos are all well documented for evaluation and monitoring purpose.

Under this scheme, food is served to the Out of School Children enrolled in the four different educational OoSC Centres ran by SPARK. SPARK has also received the Women Transforming India Award in 2017 being conferred by NITI Aayog , New Delhi
